```{r data files}
ds <- read_rds("../data/2018_4_2_c2016_syfus_inst_healthrec_ctra_no_t7.rds")

vars <- ds %>% 
  names %>% 
  noquote

vars %<>% 
  as.tibble() %>% 
  rename(
    variable = value
  )

vars
```

```{r}
vars %>% write_csv("../data/c2016_codebook.csv")
```
